name: AMULET Analytics
description:
AMULET Analytics is the data science consultancy of renowned industry expert Daniel D. Gutierrez. Daniel’s areas of specialty include:
Data science
Machine learning
Computational marketing
Predictive analytics
Data analysis
Visualization
In addition to being a data science consultant, Daniel also serves as Managing Editor for highly regarded big data industry news source: insideBIGDATA. He also writes for Big Data Republic and All Analytics (both UBM publications along with Information Week). Daniel is active in the data science education space by serving as Community TA for several Coursera MOOC classes. In his free time, he’s working on a new book, “Introduction to Machine Learning with R” due out later in 2014.
Daniel is available for the following consulting engagements in data science:
On-site consulting
Remote consulting
Speaking
Education/training
READ MORE...
